My Work

Back to Projects List

Gatsby Cosmetics Blog

- Tehnologies used:

Gatsby, GraphQL, CSS, Reactstrap, Contentful (as CMS for blog posts)

This is a blog page created with Gatsby (framework powered by React) and it's used for creating a cosmetics blog posts. As a base for frontend is used Gatsby with a combination of the CSS and Reactstrap. Also for creating this page is used GraphQL and Contentful as CMS for blog posts.

- Project purpose:

Blog page is used for advertisement of the various cosmetic products and writing a modern blog post with multimedia content with the usage of the CMS platform. Client was satisfied with content but there is much space for adding additional content (ex. webshop etc.).

Back to Projects List

Employee Menager App

- Tehnologies used:

Vue.js, CSS, Firebase (as database)

This is the Employee Manager app that is created with Vue.js and its main purpose is to store data for employees in some firm or other business subjects. For basic styling is used CSS and it's frameworks. For backend is used Firebase that is a great and free real-time database for easy storing data.

- Project purpose:

The main purpose of this project was to create an application that will make easy adding workers data and sorting them by organizational sectors or other parts of the firm. There are also filtering and searching options that can easily be upgraded with the wishes of the client. Because my current work is connected to human resources and organization of the personal data for workers it made my work much easier. This app is created and inspired by Brad Traversy's work.

Back to Projects List

React E-Store

- Tehnologies used:

React.js, CSS (with styled components)

This is an e-commerce app with options for selling various items on it. This project is mainly created with React.js and styled with CSS and with the usage of styled-components hat made things much easyer. This project is also using PayPal Sandbox for adding PayPal payment options for users.

- Project purpose:

This app can be used as part of some website as a webshop for selling various items depending on the client's working activities. It can be also used as a stand-alone app with adding some basic additional options.

Back to Projects List

Caffe Bar Website

- Tehnologies used:

Vanilla Java Script, CSS, Firebase (as database)

This project has created a website for Caffe-bar with an imaginary name. The base of the webpage can be used for a real job and updated with multimedia and other additional content with customers' wishes. For the backend is used Firebase database and its options for storing people that can get free drinks by filling a simple form.

- Project purpose:

The main purpose of this project was to train my implementation of vanilla JavaScript in realtime projects and to create some websites that can be used as a realtime job option with some changes that can be added by various client's wishes. This was also a combination of frontend and simple backend technologies in the same project.

Back to Projects List

React Weather App

- Tehnologies used:

React.js, CSS, OpenWeatherMap API

This is a simple web app that uses React.js as a base and connection to OpenWeatherMap API to get desired weather conditions and display it for the user.

- Project purpose:

This can be a standalone app or part of some other websites or applications. Most of the modern websites have weather conditions options so it can be used as part of those pages. The main purpose of creating this app was for me to implement some React.js operations with usage of API.

Back to Projects List

Random Quote Mashine

- Tehnologies used:

HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JS and jQuery

This is one of those practice projects where I tried to implement a combination of various technologies and frameworks in the same project - in this case, JavaScript and jQuery for the functionality of page and CSS and Bootstrap for styling, also with the usage of API connection to get random quotes.

- Project purpose:

The main purpose of this project is a demonstration of the programming language, technologies and frameworks that I learned at that time and how can they can be added to one particular project. There is also space for adding this app as a part of some larger app or website that uses these thematics.

JavaScript Calculator

- Tehnologies used:

HTML, CSS, JS

This is one of the practice projects that were a combination of vanilla JavaScript for the basic functionality of the calculator and HTML + CSS wor basic setup and styling.

- Project purpose:

The main purpose of this project is a demonstration of the programming language and technologies that I learned at that time and how can they can be added to one particular project. There is also space for adding this app as a part of some larger app or website.

Tribute Page

- Tehnologies used:

HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

This is one of those practice projects that is a demonstration of how to create a simple landing page with the usage of HTML + CSS + Bootstrap. There is for sure much space for adding additional dynamic content and changing purpose and thematics.

- Project purpose:

The purpose of this project is to demonstrate how to set up a basic landing page with the usage of minimal technologies and get a nice visual effect. There is not much space to use this project for practical purposes, only for the demonstration of achieved skills at that time.
